data.description: BEAUTIFUL 2 BEDROOM, 2 BATHROOM CONDO IN A GATED COMMUNITY WITH MANY AMENITIES! CHECK OUT THIS ACCESSIBLE AND AIRY GROUND FLOOR CONDO UNIT WITH AN OPEN CONCEPT AND PLENTY OF NATURAL LIGHT. LAMINATE WOOD FLOORS THROUGHOUT. NICE KITCHEN WITH GRANITE COUNTERTOPS AND STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES. BOTH BEDROOMS HAVE WALK-IN CLOSETS, AND THE PRIMARY BEDROOM HAS A COVERED PATIO. THE HVAC SYSTEM WAS REPLACED IN 2021, AND THE GARBAGE DISPOSAL WAS REPLACED IN 2023. THE UNIT ALSO COMES WITH A 25' X 4' STORAGE SHED. CONVENIENTLY LOCATED JUST MINUTES FROM POPULAR LAS VEGAS ATTRACTIONS SUCH AS THE LAS VEGAS STRIP, ALLEGIANT STADIUM, T-MOBILE ARENA, AND THE AIRPORT. THERE ARE ALSO NEARBY RESTAURANTS AND SHOPPING OPTIONS. ENJOY AN AMAZING COMMUNITY WITH RESORT-STYLE AMENITIES INCLUDING TWO SWIMMING POOLS, TWO SPAS, A CLUBHOUSE, AN EXERCISE FACILITY, AND BBQ GRILLS.
